entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , West Nipissing
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:33 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High minus 24.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 24. Wind chill minus 40 this morning and minus 34 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 31 with temperature rising to minus 26 by morning.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 31 with temperature rising to minus 26 by morning. Wind chill minus 40 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning in the morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 late in the morning. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 36 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023
